item.title: VirtualBox
item.description: VirtualBox This configuration will walk you through the steps of downloading and installing Oracle VM VirtualBox. VirtualBox is a virtualization tool. It will allow you to create a virtual operating system inside of your host operating system. Using this tool we will be able to begin working with a Linux Operating System inside of your personal operating system without compromising the integrity of your current Operating System. VirtualBox will handle all the implementation details and will create a isolated sandbox environment with the guest Linux Operating System.
